response.original_title: Das Erbe des Arabischen Frühlings - Zwischen Aufbruch und Chaos
response.overview: the spring of 2011, the Arab countries are shaken by a wind of revolt. Starting in Sidi Bouzid, Tunisia, it ignited in a few months no less than seventeen countries in North Africa and the Middle East. Citizens revolting against authoritarian and corrupt governments took to the streets to demand democracy, a better distribution of wealth and more individual freedoms.
response.tagline: Arabellion: The Legacy of the Arab Spring
response.title: Das Erbe des Arabischen Frühlings - Zwischen Aufbruch und Chaos
